Translations.Text: Huo shuo:“Jiaruo an la yindao wo, wo biding shi jingwei zhe.”
Huo zai kanjian xingfa de shihou, shuo:“Dan yuan wo de fanhui chenshi, namo, wo yao bian cheng xingshan zhe.”
Buran! Wo de xuduo jixiang, que yi lailin ni, dan dou bei ni fourenle, ni wangzizunda, ni bian cheng yige bu xindao zhe
Fuhuo ri, ni jiang kan dao wumie an la de ren mianse bian hei. Nandao huo yu li meiyou zi da zhe de zhuchu ma
An la zhengjiu jingwei zhe tuoli kunan, bing shi tamen huode chenggong, tamen bu zao huohuan, ye bu youchou
An la shi chuangzao wanwu de, yeshi jianhu wanwu de
tiandi de yaoshi, zhishi ta de; buxin an la de jixiang zhe, cai shi kui she de
Ni shuo:“Wuzhi de ren a! Nandao nimen jiao wo chongbai an la yiwai de shenling ma?”
Ni he ni yiqian de ren, dou feng dao qishi shuo:“Ruguo ni yi wu pei zhu, ze ni de shangong, biding wuxiao, er ni biding chengwei kui she zhe
Buran! Ni yingdang zhi chongbai an la, ni ying dang zuo ganxie zhe.”

Tamen meiyou qieshi di renshi an la. Fuhuo ri, dadi jiang quanbu wo zai ta de quantou zhong, zhu tian jiang juan zai ta de youshou zhong. Zansong an la, chaojue wanwu, ta chao hu tamen suoyong qu pei ta de
